---
name: create-test
description: create test for backend feature
---

Create a test for the backend feature. The test should cover the following scenarios:
1. Successful creation of a new content with valid data.
2. Validation error when required fields are missing.
3. successful update of existing content with valid data.
4. Validation error when trying to update content with invalid data.
5. successful deletion of content.
6. successful retrieval of content by ID.
